>
[Well-Groomed](/Feats.aspx?ID=1265) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are fastidious about keeping yourself clean, whether licking your fur or carefully using traditional catfolk hygiene products, to salubrious effect. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=46). If you roll a success on a saving throw against a disease, you get a critical success instead.
name: Well-Groomed
